entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h late in the morning. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 44 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 27 February 2023
